original_text: I would have liked to keep him with me so that he could take your place in helping me while I am in chains for the gospel.
korean_text: 그를 내게 머물러 있게 하여 내 복음을 위하여 갇힌 중에서 네 대신 나를 섬기게 하고자 하나

sentences.original_text: I would have liked to keep him with me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그를 내 곁에 두고 싶었지만

sentences.original_text: so that he could take your place
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 당신의 자리를 대신할 수 있도록
